objects.specification: A large rectangular floor panel with a matte black finish, slightly reflective surface with subtle texture, evoking the feel of a premium showroom floor. Edges are cleanly chamfered.
A tall rectangular wall panel with a smooth metallic gray finish, minimalistic design and seamless surface, forming the rear boundary of the booth.
A tall rectangular wall panel with a smooth metallic gray finish, minimalistic design and seamless surface, forming the left boundary of the booth.
A tall rectangular wall panel with a smooth metallic gray finish, minimalistic design and seamless surface, forming the right boundary of the booth.

A sleek modern demonstration car with a glossy red body, aerodynamic curves, tinted glass windows, black alloy wheels with low-profile tires, LED headlights and taillights, and subtle chrome accents along the trim.
A contemporary rectangular reception desk featuring a glossy black countertop, a metallic red base with clean lines, and integrated cable management channels, evoking a high-end automotive style.
A tall vertical banner panel printed with high-resolution automotive graphics, featuring vibrant red and black color accents, mounted on a slim rectangular frame with clean edges.
A tall vertical banner panel printed with high-resolution automotive graphics, featuring vibrant red and black color accents, mounted on a slim rectangular frame with clean edges.

A round table with a black matte tabletop, thin metallic legs in a gunmetal finish, and a clean minimalist profile for a modern seating area.
A minimalist chair with a padded black seat, slim metal frame in dark gray, and a slight ergonomic curve to the backrest.
A minimalist chair with a padded black seat, slim metal frame in dark gray, and a slight ergonomic curve to the backrest.

A slender cylindrical ceiling light fixture in warm yellow tone, with a smooth surface and uniform glow, suspended just below the ceiling.
